summary: Comprehensive testing of Arangetram event planning platform completed. Backend APIs 95.2% success rate, frontend core flows working excellently. AI recommendations, guest authentication, vendor management, and event planning all functional.

minor_issues.issue: Test expected 401 but got 200 due to timestamp reuse
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact - test logic issue only

minor_issues.issue: Occasional timeout when clicking vendor cards
Chat widget not immediately visible on landing page

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and category navigation
Browse Vendors page with category filtering and search functionality
Plan Event page - complete form functionality with date picker, guest count, budget selection
AI recommendations generation and display by category
User registration page with Family/Vendor options
Vendor dashboard access protection (proper redirect to login)
User dashboard functionality with events and bookings tabs
Backend API endpoints: auth, vendors, events, bookings, AI chat, recommendations
Database seeding with 13 Bay Area vendors
